content: last m p1 m1r sm k2 shawl body row 2 ws k2 sm p1 k1 to one st before next m p1 sm k1 p8 k1 p8 k1 sm p1 k1 to one st before last m p1 sm k2 shawl body row 3 k2 sm m1l k1 p1 to one st before next m k1 m1r sm p1 k2 c4f k2 p1 k2 c4b k2 p1 sm m1l k1 p1 to one st before last m k1 m1r sm k2 shawl body row 4 k2 sm k1 p1 to one st before next m k1 sm k1 p8 k1 p8 k1 sm k1 p1 to one st before last m k1 sm k2 shawl body row 5 k2 sm m1l p1 k1 to one st before next m p1 m1r sm p1 k4 c4f p1 c4b k4 p1 sm m1l p1 k1 to one st before last m p1 m1r sm k2 shawl body row 6 k2 sm p1 k1 to one st before next m p1 sm k1 p8 k1 p8 k1 sm p1 k1 to one st before last m p1 sm k2 shawl body row 7 k2 sm m1l k1 p1 to one st before next m k1 m1r sm p1 k8 p1 k8 p1 sm m1l k1 p1 to one st before last m k1 m1r sm k2 shawl body row 8 k2 sm k1 p1 to one st before next m k1 sm k1 p8 k1 p8 k1 sm k1 p1 to one st before last pattern notes m k1 sm k2 shawl is knit from the top down you ll increase four sts every right-side row on either side of a 19-stitch staghorn cable spine and a 2-stitch garter border incorporating new sts into a k1 p1 ribbing pattern a cable needle for the cabled spine is optional you might choose to work your center cable without a needle--this is a great project to practice this skill shawl set-up cast on 25 sts set-up row 1 rs k2 pm k1 pm k19 pm k1 pm k2 set-up row 2 ws knit slipping markers as you come to them set-up row 3 rs k2 sm m1l k1 m1r sm p1 k8 p1 k8 p1 sm m1l k1 m1r sm k2 set-up row 4 ws k2 sm k1 p1 k1 sm k1 p8 k1 p8 k1 sm k1 p1 k1 k2 country weekend shawl version 1 // ©2024 the lamb & kid // all rights reserved page 3 for personal use only no portion of this pattern may be reproduced or distributed in any form or by any means without written permission repeat shawl body row 1-8 eleven more times finishing with each 8-row repeat your shawl increases a total of 16 sts bind off on rs with a stretchy bind-off of your choice we like after the last repeat you will have 221 sts on your needle 99 an icelandic bind-off for a tidy-yet-stretchy edge that blocks ribbed sts between markers on each side
